triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: ProAgent leverages LLMs as the core mechanism for enabling adaptive proactive agent behavior.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the challenge of building agents that cooperate effectively in multi-agent systems.

triples.name: Cooperative game theory
triples.relevance: The paper applies cooperative game theory principles to enable agents to form effective coalitions and coordinate behaviors.

triples.name: Zero-shot learning
triples.relevance: ProAgent addresses zero-shot coordination scenarios where agents must adapt to unfamiliar teammates without prior training together.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper contrasts its LLM-based approach with traditional learning-based methods that rely on reinforcement learning.

triples.name: Self-play
triples.relevance: ProAgent outperforms self-play based training methods when cooperating with AI agents in the Overcooked environment.

triples.name: Multi-agent learning
triples.relevance: The paper builds on multi-agent learning techniques to address the challenge of adaptive cooperation between heterogeneous agents.

triples.name: Population-based incremental learning
triples.relevance: ProAgent outperforms population-based training approaches in achieving high performance with diverse teammates.

triples.name: Theory of mind
triples.relevance: ProAgent infers teammate intentions from observations, applying theory of mind principles to understand others' mental states.

triples.name: Bayesian inference
triples.relevance: ProAgent updates beliefs about teammate behaviors in alignment with actual observations, using Bayesian belief updating principles.

triples.name: Overcooked
triples.relevance: Overcooked-AI is the benchmark environment used to evaluate ProAgent's performance in cooperative multi-agent scenarios.

triples.name: Generalization
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the generalization challenge where agents must adapt to teammates beyond those encountered during training.

triples.name: Intelligent agent
triples.relevance: ProAgent proposes proactive intelligent agents that dynamically adapt their behavior to enhance cooperation with different teammates.

triples.name: Adaptive behavior
triples.relevance: ProAgent introduces mechanisms for agents to exhibit adaptive behavior by analyzing state, inferring intentions, and updating beliefs dynamically.
